title: Embr NwHacks 2025
desc: Real-time global wildfire tracking platform with interactive map, air quality alerts, and displayed news related to the local wildfire. Integrated GPT-4o to generate nearby shelters and hospitals, and a HuggingFace LLM chatbot for user guidance assistance.

title: Personal Finance & Expense Tracker
desc: Java desktop app to track income, expenses, and budgeting. Features include entry via categorized JList, overspending alerts, data visualizations, and full CRUD support for all financial items.

title: Personal Ecommerce Website
desc: Created a frontend e-commerce webpage to sell my original digital art, featuring prints and stationery products and prototyped webpages on Figma, including mobile-responsive designs for a better user experience across all devices.

title: Pixel Artist
desc: Built a lightweight, browser-based pixel art editor using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can customize grid sizes, pick colors, and draw pixel-by-pixel on an intuitive retro-style interface.
